descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]Hotkeys for Dualshock 4[/size][size=3] [/size][/b]

In order to use dualshock 4 in skyrim you need to install steam and activate the settings in steam big picture
[b]Open Steam, go to bigpicture and select settings> controller> activate support ps4 mode , profit[/b]


[size=3]L2 - Attack/Block
R2 - Attack/Block
L1 - Sprint
R1 - Activator/Modifier

Share - Favorites
Options - Journal

LS - Move
RS - Look
L3 - Auto Move
R3 - Toggle POV (camera Zoom In/Out - Hold R3 + LS)

Up - Hotkey 3 (to binding hold Up ect.)
Down - Hotkey 4
Left - Hotkey 1
Right - Hotkey 2

Triangle - Jump
X - Activate
Square - Ready Weapons
Circle - Sneak

[b][color=#ff0000]Activator/Modifier (R1+..)[/color][/b]

L2 - Wait
L1 - Shout

Share - Screenshot

L3 - Quick Load
R3 - Quick Save

Up - Hotkey 7 (to binding hold R1+Up ect.)
Down - Hotkey 8
Left - Hotkey 5
Right - Hotkey 6

Triangle - Stats
X - Map
Square - Magic
Circle - Inventory

[b]
Installation : Unpack to main Skyrim folder
[/b]In the archive is the modified controlmap file.

Recommended settings Skyrim.ini 

[MapMenu]
fGamepadCursorSensitivity=0.7000
fMapLocalMarkerSelectionDist=0.0100
fMaxMarkerSelectionDist=0.0100
[Camera]
fThumbstickZoomSpeed=0.0150000000
[/size]
author: Beerezil
